organize.title: Organize your pantry effortlessly

batches.title: Batch and expiry control
batches.description: Track batches, expiration dates, and get alerts before anything goes bad.

suggestions.title: Smart purchase suggestions
suggestions.description: Know what to restock based on usage, minimum stock, and upcoming expiries.

agent.title: Unlock the AI Meal Planner (PRO)

dashboard.title: Home

purchaseModal.title: Add purchase

suggestions.title: Suggested purchases
suggestions.empty: Nothing pending right now. I'll let you know when something needs restocking.

share.error: We couldn't share the shopping list.
share.dialogText: Share your grocery list as a PDF.

expiringLowStock.title: Products close to expiring with low stock
expiringLowStock.description: Some products combine an upcoming expiry and low stock.
expiringLowStock.planPrompt: Help me plan recipes that use the low-stock items expiring soon.
expiringLowStock.ideasPrompt: Give me quick ideas to use those ingredients before they spoil.

expiredWithStock.title: Expired products still available
expiredWithStock.description: Some expired products still have stock that needs review.
expiredWithStock.planPrompt: Create a plan to consume the items that already expired but are still in my pantry.
expiredWithStock.ideasPrompt: Suggest recipes or uses to salvage those expired products.

lowStockNoExpiry.title: Low stock even without urgent expiries
lowStockNoExpiry.description: There are several low-stock items even though nothing is expiring soon.

duplicatedProducts.title: Duplicated products in the pantry
duplicatedProducts.description: Some items share the same name in different entries. Review and consolidate them.

weeklyMealPlanning.title: Plan your meals for the week
weeklyMealPlanning.description: Plan this week's meals with what you already have.
weeklyMealPlanning.prompt: Plan my meals for this week using only what I already have in the pantry.

cookBeforeExpiry.title: Cook before they expire
cookBeforeExpiry.description: Use up the products that are about to expire and still have stock.
cookBeforeExpiry.prompt: Suggest recipes that prioritize the products expiring soon in my pantry.

lunchIdeas.title: What can I make for lunch?
lunchIdeas.description: Quick lunch ideas using your pantry.
lunchIdeas.prompt: Give me lunch options for today using what I already have.

dinnerIdeas.title: What can I make for dinner?
dinnerIdeas.description: Dinner suggestions with what you already have.
dinnerIdeas.prompt: Plan a simple dinner using the ingredients in my pantry.

whatToCookNow.title: What should I cook now?
whatToCookNow.description: Not sure what to eat? I'll suggest ideas with your pantry.
whatToCookNow.prompt: Share quick meal ideas using only the ingredients I already own.

planAndSaveTime.title: Plan meals and save time every week
planAndSaveTime.description: Unlock the PRO planner and organize your menu easily.

messages.noEndpoint: Meal planner endpoint is not configured.
messages.callFailed: It looks like the meal planner connection had a temporary issue. Please try again in a few seconds.
messages.incompleteToolCall: The meal planner couldn't gather all the data needed to run that action. Please rephrase or try again.
messages.unifiedError: The meal planner couldn‚Äôt reply right now. Please try again in a few seconds.

errors.unknownLocation: I can't understand the location. Try pantry, fridge, kitchen or freezer.
errors.missingMoveData: Product, origin and destination are required.
errors.invalidMoveLocation: Some of the provided locations are not recognized.
errors.notFound: "{{ name }}" was not found. Are you sure it exists?
errors.missingAdjustData: Missing data to adjust stock (product, location and numeric delta).
errors.invalidLocation: I can't understand the provided location.
errors.noStock: "{{ name }}" has no stock in {{ location }}.
errors.batchNotFound: I couldn't find a lot with that date.
errors.invalidArguments: We need valid information to run that action. Please review the fields.

results.addExisting: Added stock to {{ name }} in {{ location }}
results.moveSummary: Moved {{ amount }} from {{ from }} to {{ to }}
results.adjustSummary: Adjusted {{ name }} in {{ location }} to {{ quantity }}
results.expiringFound: Found {{ count }} products expiring in {{ days }} days
results.recipesPromptWith: Use these ingredients (prioritize the soon-to-expire ones): {{ ingredients }}. Return 2-3 concise recipes.
results.recipesPromptAuto: Generate 2 simple recipes using pantry staples.
results.recipesSystem: You are a chef that shares short recipes with numbered steps.
results.suggestionsSummary: {{ count }} suggestions active (expired: {{ expired }}, expiring: {{ nearExpiry }}, low stock: {{ low }})
results.suggestionsEmpty: Everything looks good, no alerts right now.

desc.basic: Show only items marked as staples

ai.title: AI
ai.subtitle: Share context for the planner.
ai.contextDescription: Tell the planner about your household, diets, dislikes or any preference it should always remember.
ai.contextPlaceholder: Example: We are two adults and a toddler. Avoid spicy food and peanuts. Focus on Mediterranean recipes.
ai.saveError: Could not save the planner context.

data.title: Data management
data.subtitle: Control what is stored on this device.
data.resetDescription: Remove all information saved on this device.
data.exportDescription: Download a JSON file with your current data.
data.importDescription: Restore a JSON backup you exported earlier.

reset.confirm:
This will delete ALL local app data.
Do you want to continue?

export.unavailable: Export is not available in this environment.
export.shareText: Export or share your pantry backup.

import.confirm: This will replace your current data with the selected file. Continue?

import.invalid: The selected file is not a valid backup.
import.empty: The file has no data to import.
